description: Peterborough push themselves five points clear of the relegation zone after a stalemate at draw specialists Blackpool.
title: Blackpool 0-0 Peterborough United
maintext:
In all competitions, Blackpool have lost four of their last five meetings with Peterborough United (W1), this after winning four in a row against the Posh beforehand.
After their 5-1 win in October, Peterborough could complete a league double over Blackpool for the first time since 1983-84.
Only Birmingham have lost fewer home games in League One this season than Blackpool (2), who are looking to win back-to-back home league matches for the second time this season (after September), having won 3-1 over Crawley to end an eight-game drawing run.
Peterboroughâ€™s 1-0 win at Huddersfield ended a 13-game winless run away from home in League One (D3 L10). The Posh have scored exactly once in each of their last five away league outings.
